creator: calestyo@scientia.net
text:
Hi.

The Listen documentation should mention that hostnames can be used as well... perhaps linking to the (only partially correct) DNS Caveats documentation page.

Cheers,
Chris.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text:
We have a policy of not documenting things that are not best practice. Yes, you can use a hostname in a Listen directive, but it's not recommended, so we're not going to encourage it by specifically mentioning it in the doc.

If there are specific things in the DNS caveats doc that you want modified, please open a ticket about those.

Thanks.
